description.raw:
This is being broken into several pull requests:

* ~~pull request #167~~
* ~~pull request #168~~

---

### Current features

* Each plugin can either be `floating` or `docked`
    * `floating`: can be freely moved, resized and positioned on the screen above all others
    * `docked`: embedded into the window layout and 
* It is possible to transition from `floating` to `docked` and vice-cersa
* `floating` plugins' positions can be:
    * absolute within the window
    * anchored to the window or to another plugin (currently only settable from XML)
* The docks respect the plugin's `Layout.minimum[Width/Height]` settings
* As plugins are inserted, they're automatically docked

![docking_opt.gif](data/bitbucket.org/repo/64K5zaR/images/2290434147-docking_opt.gif)


---

### TODO

* Remove jump when hiding toolbar on floating state
* Save / reload split sizes
* Support setting floating plugin's background color
* Support dock repositioning
* Support other layouts (currently hardcoded to 1 horizontal split -> multiple vertical splits)
* Close anchored plugins when target anchor plugin is closed
